name: Power Pro Kun Pocket 13
overview: Power Pro Kun Pocket 13 (パワプロクンポケット13?) is a baseball game which was developed by Pawapuro Production and published by Konami and released on Nintendo DS on November 25, 2010 in Japan. It is the thirteenth entry in the Power Pro Kun Pocket series, a spin-off series of the MLB Power Pros series.
